refined_action_summary: Improve setup with a comfortable elbow angle, add more wrist coil in the backswing, and keep full extension at impact for a stronger forehand clear.

setup.refined_suggestion: Keep the elbow slightly more open so the arm forms a relaxed, balanced angle during the setup.

backswing.refined_suggestion: Let the wrist hinge back further to create more racket head distance and store elastic power for the forward swing.

power.refined_suggestion: Stretch the hitting arm fully through the shuttle at impact to maximize speed and lift.

improvement_drills: Practice repeating the setup with a relaxed elbow opening
Practice controlled wrist coil during the backswing
Practice full arm follow-through at impact
next_steps: Record a new video after practice to check for smoother setup, stronger wrist coil, and full extension
